page.title: 01Area Grid Ref. 03360951
page.content: This are includes the part of Wick to the North of Wick River, the villages of Papigoe and Staxigoe, and some flat fertile farmland.The South West corner is mostly a residential and shopping area. Beside the town is Wick Airport which is a vital link to the South. To the East of Wick after passing through a new private housing are we follow the road along the coast to Papigoe and Staxigoe. The Coastline is very rocky with spectacular scenery. To the South East we can see an oilrig which is situated just off the coast of Caithness. North of Wick we have a large area of good farmland used mainly to raise beef cattle and sheep, consisting of Upper Ackergill, Shorelands and Field of Noss Farms. The most Easterly part of the area is sea.
